document_data.name: Dandelion Wine
document_data.mainbody: '''Dandelion wine''' was a type of fermented alcoholic drink prepared using the [[dandelion]] flowering plant. The drink was a rare sight outside of several areas where it was made.
document_data.Availability: Fine dandelion wine was created by the [[halfling]]s of [[Amn]], notably, the area around [[Burrowville]]. Inhabitants of the [[Darkhold Vale]] in the [[Far Hills]] had perfected the recipe for dandelion wine and were known to produce it as long as anyone could remember. By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], dandelion wine from Darkhold started gaining popularity thanks to trade.
document_data.Notable Owner: *[[Murrey Undervale]] and [[Horace Willowwood]], a duo of halfling [[rogue]]s ensorcelled by the [[Zhentarim]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], in Amn.
